jdbcService.sql: select cac.name, cac.icon, cac.mixin, ca1.name, ca2.name, caa.id from component_anchor ca1 join component_anchor_action caa on ca1.id = caa.component_anchor_id join component_anchor ca2 on caa.target_anchor_id = ca2.id join component_action cac on cac.id = aa.component_action_id where an1.component_template_id = :templateId
